data: It was perfect weather along the San Francisco water-front, and Rainey reacted to the brisk touch of the trade-wind upon his cheek, the breeze tempering the sun, bringing with it a tang of the open sea and a hint of Oriental spices from the wharves.
Dunn, J. Allan, (Joseph Allan), 1872-1941; Mulford, Stockton, 1886-1960 [Illustrator]
